City Leadership
===============

* [December 12, 2022](https://www.tafttx.gov/news/2022/12/12/)

The City of Taft uses the council-manager form of government and is served by the mayor and four council members. The city council is the governing body of the city, elected by the public, and the
[city manager](https://www.tafttx.gov/departments/city-manager/)
is hired by the council to carry out the policies it establishes.

The city council holds
[regular meetings](https://www.tafttx.gov/events/)
on the first Tuesdays of each month at 6:30 P.M. Unless otherwise noted, meetings take place at City Hall, located at 230 Green Avenue. Public participation is encouraged.

#### Elida Castillo
